members.name: Jisoo
members.bio: Jisoo is the eldest member of BLACKPINK, known for her stunning visuals and sweet yet powerful vocals. She has also acted in K-dramas and is admired for her charm and elegance.

members.name: Jennie
members.bio: Jennie is known for her fierce rap style, stage charisma, and unique fashion sense. She was the first member to debut as a solo artist with her single 'SOLO'.

members.name: Rosé
members.bio: Rosé is recognized for her soulful voice and emotional performances. She plays guitar and piano, and debuted as a soloist with the album 'R'.

members.name: Lisa
members.role: Main Dancer, Lead Rapper, Sub Vocalist
members.bio: Lisa is the only non-Korean member of BLACKPINK. Famous for her powerful dance skills and rap, she has a huge international fanbase and debuted as a soloist with 'LALISA'.
